mdRecord.dcterms:description: This stapled booklet begins with a message from the Pastor, John Ervin Trotman. This is followed by a piece on Baptist Tradition. The rest of the booklet includes a budget, a calendar, lists of Special Assignments, Staff and Officers, Our Family, and a general directory of the membership. Please note that there is an error in page numbering -- page 5 is not missing; it was skipped in the original numbering.
mdRecord.dcterms:title: Church Manual, First Baptist Church, 1969
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Handbooks and manuals
First Baptist Church (Lexington, Va.)
